resources.string: Input how many Kg\'s you want to lose and we will give you how much calories you need to take , taking in count your height weight age
2,000-calorie diets are considered standard for most adults, as this number is considered adequate to meet most people’s energy and nutrient needs.
The 1,500-calorie diet is a diet plan that people may try when attempting to lose weight. By eating fewer calories and exercising regularly.
the 1,000 calorie meal diet is a short-term, slightly extreme diet plan that requires you to slash the calories you’re eating and opt for high-protein, low-fat and calorie foods
Choose wich Diets fits you more
